description: Need an easy schnitzel dish to add to your weekly rotation? This tasty recipe will impress even the fussiest of eaters.
name: Quick Beef Sizzle Schnitzel With Almonds & Potato Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 bunch continental parsley, leaves picked (to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large non-stick frying pan over medium heat. Add almonds and cook, tossing for 2 minutes or until toasted.
Heat oil in a large frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook beef, in batches, for 1 minute each side or until browned and just cooked through. Transfer to a plate. Cover loosely with foil to rest.
Place peas in a heatproof bowl. Cover with boiling water. Stand for 3 minutes or until bright green and tender. Drain. Place potato salad in a bowl. Add peas and stir gently to combine.
Spoon potato salad onto serving plates. Top with beef and sprinkle with almonds and parsley. Serve.
